Class ObjectStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.pdf.PDFObject

          • org.apache.fop.pdf.ObjectStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PDFWritable

    public class ObjectStream
extends PDFStream
    An object stream, as described in section 3.4.6 of the PDF 1.5 Reference.
